00022 #ifndef __MLPACK_METHODS_FASTMKS_FASTMKS_STAT_HPP
00023 #define __MLPACK_METHODS_FASTMKS_FASTMKS_STAT_HPP
00024 
00025 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00026 #include <mlpack/core/tree/tree_traits.hpp>
00027 
00028 namespace mlpack {
00029 namespace fastmks {
00030 
00035 class FastMKSStat
00036 {
00037  public:
00041   FastMKSStat() : bound(-DBL_MAX), selfKernel(0.0) { }
00042 
00050   template<typename TreeType>
00051   FastMKSStat(const TreeType& node) :
00052       bound(-DBL_MAX)
00053   {
00054     // Do we have to calculate the centroid?
00055     if (tree::TreeTraits<TreeType>::FirstPointIsCentroid)
00056     {
00057       // If this type of tree has self-children, then maybe the evaluation is
00058       // already done.  These statistics are built bottom-up, so the child stat
00059       // should already be done.
00060       if ((tree::TreeTraits<TreeType>::HasSelfChildren) &&
00061           (node.NumChildren() > 0) &&
00062           (node.Point(0) == node.Child(0).Point(0)))
00063       {
00064         selfKernel = node.Child(0).Stat().SelfKernel();
00065       }
00066       else
00067       {
00068         selfKernel = sqrt(node.Metric().Kernel().Evaluate(
00069             node.Dataset().unsafe_col(node.Point(0)),
00070             node.Dataset().unsafe_col(node.Point(0))));
00071       }
00072     }
00073     else
00074     {
00075       // Calculate the centroid.
00076       arma::vec centroid;
00077       node.Centroid(centroid);
00078 
00079       selfKernel = sqrt(node.Metric().Kernel().Evaluate(centroid, centroid));
00080     }
00081   }
00082 
00084   double SelfKernel() const { return selfKernel; }
00086   double& SelfKernel() { return selfKernel; }
00087 
00089   double Bound() const { return bound; }
00091   double& Bound() { return bound; }
00092 
00093  private:
00095   double bound;
00096 
00098   double selfKernel;
00099 };
00100 
00101 }; // namespace fastmks
00102 }; // namespace mlpack
00103 
00104 #endif
